content.value: displays all opportunities inside your sales pipeline arranged according to their phase in the sales cycle. This approach lets you focus on your most promising opportunities, and leads to achieve your sales goals.

messages.header_title: I love creating human centered user experiences that look and function beautifully across any device.
messages.main_title: Somewhere between the design world of
messages.across_any_device: across any device that can access the web.
messages.h1title: Hi! I’m Consuelo, a product designer and UI Developer. I love creating human centered user experiences that look and function beautifully across any device.
messages.presentation_description1: I use my skills as a product designer and my love for front-end coding to create digital products with beautiful on-brand aesthetics and strong interaction design.
messages.presentation_description2: I love creating personal visual experiences with an emphasis on clean type and expressive colors.
messages.projects_description: These are some design and web projects I’ve been working on lately.
messages.like_my_work: If you liked my work, let’s connect!
messages.work_opportunities: I’m always open to discussing product design work or freelance opportunities.
messages.title: Hi! My name's Consuelo.
messages.subtitle: I'm a UI/UX designer and web developer.
messages.description: Big thinker, problem solver and empathy advocate. Definitely a team player, I pay a lot of attention to details and always strive towards designing compelling user experiences with beautiful on-brand aesthetics and strong interaction design.
messages.my_story1: I’ve been working as a product designer and web developer for more than five years now. I’ve worked in a variety of roles and companies, first as a freelance designer making promotional material for small companies and then I started learning code and programming. I worked as a UI developer for a marketing agency, collaborating closely with the UI/UX Design Lead  to translate high fidelity mockups into functional code using HTML, CSS and JavaScript frameworks and libraries. Then I started getting interested in designing user interfaces and experiences and later in product design. I have a bachelor degree in Graphic Design so it was easy for me to make that transition.
messages.my_story2: From that moment on I’ve been working as a product designer at consulting agencies, startups and also doing some freelancing myself. I love working with different kinds of clients because I never get bored. I pay a lot of attention to details and always strive towards delivering the best solutions, not only for customers but also for business. I love branding design as well, I think a key aspect as a product designer is being able to see the project from start-to-end: from recognizing an opportunity and understanding the customer's needs through to final delivery.
messages.my_story_tech: On a personal level, technology has led me to a new world that I had never imagined. I took part in a GSMA documentary where I tell my personal story and how digital inclusion has changed my life.
messages.free_time: In my spare time I like to read, listen to podcasts and draw.
messages.problem: Get to the root of the problem.
messages.dribbbleShot: Check out my latest Dribbble shots!
